Ron and Robert,

Thanks for your replies. I agree it doesn't look like anything
authentic, but I wanted the expertise of you guys in case I was wrong
due to my fairly recent and limited knowledge. Arigatou gozai mashita!

Best Regards, 

Andres Pedraza

Light switch plate? Hmmm...very strange. Wouldn't lose any sleep over
it.

Ron
STL
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: apedraza@... 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 2004 4:12 PM
  Subject: [nihontostudy] Weird Tsuba



  Anyone want to venture a guess as to what this is? while I'm not an
  expert, I do confess I've never seen the like. Is it an authentic
  anything? And what sort of weapon is this "tsuba" supposed to go on? I
  can't see it as being functional due to the position of the hole for
  the blade.

  I hope this link works, it's the only pic in the album:
 
http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/lst?.dir=/Andres&.src=gr&.view=

  If it doesn't, can you look at the photo albums in the Yahoogroups
page
  and open the Album called Andres? That will take you there, too.

  Best Regards,

  Andres
